name: Beat Ball 2
description:
BEAT BALL 2 is now FREE - but donations will encourage me making Beat Ball 3 =)

Get a legal and free key here: https://www.imphenzia.com/beatball2-free-legal-key (no strings attached!)

Beat Ball 2 is the sequel arkanoid / breakout clone also including a level editor.

  •  108 Original Levels
  •  Level Editor and MediaPack Editor
  •  Internet Global Highscores  (no longer active)
  •  Lot's of Powerups
  •  Play up to 4 players locally
  •  Animated blocks and Creatures

How to install and play:

  1. Download
  2. Unzip
  3. Run installer to install game
  4. Go here to get a free key
  5. Play game and Enter Registration Key to unlock all levels

Note: If you are running Windows 10 and get an error - make sure you run Windows Update and install all the latest patches. The game requires DirectPlay to be installed and the later versions of Windows 10 will ask to install that once the game is started.
